title: Hackathon 2024
description: A 48-hour coding competition where students developed innovative solutions to real-world problems. Over 200 participants showcased their creativity and technical skills.

title: Spring Music Festival
description: An unforgettable evening of live music featuring student bands, solo artists, and cultural performances. The festival celebrated the diverse musical talents of our campus community.

title: Research Symposium
description: Graduate and undergraduate students presented their research findings across various disciplines. The event featured keynote speakers and interactive poster sessions.
